flawed_nl_solution:
He consumes 2500+1000=<<2500+1000=3500>>3500 calories on Saturday
He consumes 2500*6+3500=<<2500*6+3500=18500>>18500 calories in the week.
He burns 3000*7=<<3000*7=210000>>210000 calories in the week
His caloric deficit is 210000-18500=<<210000-18500=191500>>191500 calories per week
#### 191500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21000, not 210000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
